review: Stay for 2 nights  I think i would have go for any Dharamshala rather than this hotel,  Only one person is there to look after the same,  Rooms are like as not in use for months, Linen absolutely useless,  Bathroom is so dirty and smelly badly to use,  Location wise very much in the hopeless place,  Goibibo refunded my booking amount after getting investigate the complaint made by me,   I insist hotel owner to look after the same ,
name: Shailesh B
